```{r}
library(tidyverse)
lotr  <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jennybc/lotr-tidy/master/data/lotr_tidy.csv") |> 
  rename(Species = Race)
```
# Wide species into columns 
```{r}
(lotr_wide <- lotr |> 
  pivot_wider(id_cols = c(-Species, -Words), 
              names_from = Species, 
              values_from = Words))
```
```{r}
lotr_wide |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = Elf:Man, 
               names_to  = "species", 
               values_to = "words")
```
